items.sentence: I wish that I didn\'t have to tell you this.
Tom likes to show everyone how strong he is.
Tom made a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
Don\'t you think you can help Tom with that?
Don\'t you three ever go to Boston together?
Tom was the only person to survive the fire.
Tom wondered what happened to his old truck.
Tom should\'ve asked Mary to come to Boston.
Tom should\'ve been here thirty minutes ago.
Tom should\'ve discussed the matter with me.
The enemy wanted to discuss a truce with us.
Don\'t you understand what\'s going on here?
I wish that Tom had shown me how to do that.
I\'m sorry I wasn\'t able to help very much.
I couldn\'t tell Tom what he wanted to know.
I couldn\'t think of anything to say to Tom.
Tom finished reading that book in one night.
Tom had only one chance to get things right.
Tom wouldn\'t do that if he didn\'t need to.
Tom wouldn\'t do that if he didn\'t want to.
